ROW.DATA: Routines for changing the normalization of models and calculating the weights file for mkinstmap.
Plot radial profiles of data and fits of imaging (2D) data.

ADESC.title: Changes in the scripts 4.13.1 (2020) release
ADESC.PARA: As the XSPEC convolution models are now supported by Sherpa the load_xxx commands have been removed, as has the sherpa_contrib.xspec.xsconvolve module.

ADESC.title: Changes in the scripts 4.11.4 (2019) release
ADESC.PARA: The plots created by sherpa_contrib.utils.plot_instmap_weights(), sherpa_contrib.chart.plot_chart_spectrum(), and sherpa_contrib.marx.plot_marx_spectrum() now use the Sherpa plot backend (controlled by the plot_pkg setting in a user's ~/.sherpa.rc file), rather than always using ChIPS. As part of this change the extra labelling of the plot_xxx_spectrum routines has been removed, so the plots may look slightly different.
The plots created by the sherpa_contrib.profiles set of functions, such as prof_data() and prof_fit_resid(), also now use the Sherpa plot backend.

ADESC.title: Changes in the scripts 4.11.2 (April 2019) release
ADESC.PARA: The sherpa_contrib.marx.save_marx_spectrum() function now normalizes the output by the bin width, as expected by MARX.

ADESC.title: Changes in the scripts 4.8.2 (January 2016) release
ADESC.PARA: The sherpa_contrib.utils.renorm() function was added in this release.
The sherpa_contrib.chart module has been updated to support version 2 of ChART.
The sherpa_contrib.utils.estimate_weighted_expmap() function has been updated to work in CIAO 4.8.
